'''''loss''''' is a [[Sindarin]] word meaning "'snow', especially fallen and long-lying snow".<ref name=VT42>{{VT|42a}}, p. 18</ref><ref name=PE17>{{PE|17}}, pp. 160-1</ref><ref>{{RGEO|Notes}}, p. 70</ref>
==Etymology==
*[[Sundocarme|Root]] LOS ("snow")<ref name=VT42/><ref name=PE17/>
==Examples==
*''[[Fanuilos]]''
*''[[Lossarnach#Etymology|Lossarnach]]''
*''[[Lossoth#Etymology|Lossoth]]''
*''[[Uilos]]''
==See also==
*[[Sindarin]] ''[[loth]]'' ("flower")
